Class Lit_c

polyglot.ast.Node_c
polyglot.ast.Term_c

polyglot.ast.Lit_c
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Expr, ExprOps, Lit, Node, NodeOps, Prefix, Receiver, Term, TermOps, Typed, Copy<Node>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BooleanLit_c, ClassLit_c, FloatLit_c, NullLit_c, NumLit_c, StringLit_c
public abstract class Lit_c
extends Expr_c
implements Lit
Lit represents any Java literal.

      Specified by:

    • firstChild

      public Term firstChild()
      Description copied from interface: TermOps
      Return the first direct subterm performed when evaluating this term. If this term has no subterms, this should return null. This method is similar to the deprecated entry(), but it should *not* recursively drill down to the innermost subterm. The direct child visited first in this term's dataflow should be returned.
      Specified by:
      firstChild in interface TermOps
      Specified by:
      firstChild in class Term_c

    • acceptCFG

      public <T> java.util.List<T> acceptCFG​(CFGBuilder<?> v, java.util.List<T> succs)
      Description copied from interface: TermOps
      Visit this term in evaluation order, calling v.edge() for each successor in succs, if data flows on that edge.
      Specified by:
      acceptCFG in interface TermOps
      Specified by:
      acceptCFG in class Term_c

    • constantValueSet

      public boolean constantValueSet​(Lang lang)
      Description copied from interface: ExprOps
      Return true iff the compiler has determined whether this expression has a constant value. The value returned by isConstant() is valid only if constantValueSet() is true.
      Specified by:
      constantValueSet in interface ExprOps
      Overrides:
      constantValueSet in class Expr_c

    • isConstant

      public boolean isConstant​(Lang lang)
      Description copied from interface: ExprOps
      Return whether the expression evaluates to a constant. Requires that disambiguation has been done, and that constantValueSet() is true.
      Specified by:
      isConstant in interface ExprOps
      Overrides:
      isConstant in class Expr_c

    • constantValue

      public abstract java.lang.Object constantValue​(Lang lang)
      Description copied from interface: ExprOps
      Return the constant value of the expression, if any. Requires that isConstant() is true.
      Specified by:
